title: Top Bitcoin Stocks To Watch Today – July 27th
description: Marathon Digital, Riot Platforms, IREN, Cleanspark, Core Scientific, TeraWulf, and Eightco are the seven Bitcoin stocks to watch today, according to MarketBeat’s stock screener tool. Bitcoin stocks are the publicly traded shares of companies whose core business revolves around Bitcoin—whether through mining operations, blockchain infrastructure, crypto exchanges or firms holding large Bitcoin reserves.
